Reviews.Title: “An excellent experience. Highly recommended.”
Reviews.Author: noa81
Reviews.Content: internet afraid disappointed instead found intimate hotel pleasant efficient staff receptionists familiar tourist spots berlin location hotel center destinations drive 20 minutes tram hand enjoy green parks hotel importantly sleep perfect choise vacationers business berlin highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “great value but a little far out”
Reviews.Author: ads_213
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent value money staff friendly helpful clean pretty nice decent décor sized bathroom hotel little 20 mins tram wasnt trouble trams regular stop minute hotel recommend hotel stay bigger budget consider nearer

Reviews.Title: “Good Clean Hotel But FAR”
Reviews.Author: V1210
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel hotel clean pretty city center inconvenient location berlin trams buses trains fast efficient public transportation hotel didnt provide clean bed heat cold weather provided breakfast extra fee opted eat elsewhere dont believe wifi hotel shops supermarkets etc probably recommend friend family visiting berlin check hotel closer city center securing fabulously low rate hotel recommend overall clean sleep looking shack day night supposed wouldnt berlin resort

Reviews.Title: “Do not ever stay at this hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: cmrigueiro
Reviews.Content: booked trip month ago emailed hotel usual directions airport hotel surprise booked transfered hotel double called hotel instead double single am happy recommend hotel
